aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.p:
My name is Nikita. I am a frontend developer specializing in building modern
  web interfaces using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind. I follow principles of
  clean architecture, strict typing, and predictable application behavior.
  I pay close attention to code quality, clarity of implementation, and the long-term
  maintainability of the project.  
  I continuously explore new tools and approaches to expand my expertise and remain
  effective in a rapidly evolving industry.
